column4: can anyone help me with a strange broadcom ndiswrapper problem?
xorg, no.  last night it was on and it was scanning but not connecting.  but today, the card (and light on the card) are not initializing
P.S. Good troubleshooting guide here if you haven't seen it: https://help.ubuntu.com/community/WifiDocs/WirelessTroubleShootingGuide
